name: Through The Gauntlet
description: Through the Gauntlet is an intense, thriller-dungeon crawler. The protagonist has been captured by a group of malicious Naga; creatures with snake-like lower bodies and human torsos. It is the players' mission to guide the protagonist through filthy giant rat and screeching bat infested dungeons. Utilise spear, sword and the powers gained from inhumane experiments and lay waste to your enemies as you delve deeper into the darkness. Be aware however, the dungeons are dark and light sources are limited. Can you escape alive?
